about_the_game:
To your allies, you are a guardian angel. To your enemies, you are death from above.


Angel of Death is an incredibly immersive story-driven experience that seats you at the gunner's console inside the belly of the world's most terrifying gunship. Built from the ground up as a highly interactable hands-on experience in virtual reality, Angel of Death makes you feel the tension, awe, and moral uneasiness of having the destructive power of this plane's deadly weapons at your fingertips.

The game includes a wide variety of features that will keep you hooked for hours:

  • Virtual reality-focused interactive experience—use your motion controllers to operate switches, knobs, buttons, and joysticks in-game
  • Support for non-VR players—no headset? No problem! The PC version of Angel of Death is playable on standard flatscreen with mouse & keyboard
  • Full campaign featuring 10 diverse missions—from total stealth to all-out hellfire, every level will feature totally unique playstyles, mission objectives, and locations
  • Blood-pumping and thought-provoking story—written to make you feel the severity and moral ambiguity of the destruction you're causing
  • Provide close air support for friendly ground forces—place markers to order your ground team where to go and keep them alive when they encounter the enemy
  • Death State and Defensive Measures—yes, the enemies shoot back! Destroy missile-equipped enemies and utilize flares to avoid missile fire
  • Fully-voiced characters—get to know the unique personalities of each of your teammates
  • Endless survival mode—cause as much destruction for as long as you can until you're shot out of the sky or your friendlies are eliminated
  • Old-school cheat code entry—what happened to cheat codes in modern games?? Use a variety of cheat codes to access hidden game modes, hilarious glitches & dialog, and other easter eggs

Do the ends justify the means? Find out in a dark story that tests your desire for violence.

Welcome aboard Sandman, a PMC-operated AC-130 gunship hired to provide close air support for the three members of Phantom team on the ground. Your teams have been contracted to launch a series of surgical strikes on infrastructure owned by Ferro Group, a multinational energy conglomerate, whose massive global reach and influence could soon pose a threat to the balance of the world’s superpowers. Your payout for successfully completing the mission is sizable, but you know the reason you were hired in the first place: plausible deniability. Are you willing to break the rules of engagement for your paycheck?


Jump in the gunner's seat, grab the controls, and choose your targets wisely.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains frequent violent sights such as body dismemberment, and strong language.

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3570K or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR
